meanings.definition: Relating to the study of muscles.
meanings.sent1: The myologic research focused on understanding how muscles work.
meanings.sent2: Her myologic knowledge helped her identify the different muscle groups in the body.
meanings.sent3: The myologic textbook made learning about muscles surprisingly fun.
meanings.sent4: His myologic approach to fitness training was both scientific and effective.
meanings.sent5: The myologic diagrams in the book made it easier to visualize muscle structure.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the muscular system.
meanings.sent1: The myologic changes in his body were evident after months of training.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the myologic aspects of the body to understand movement.
meanings.sent3: The myologic explanation for his strength was quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Her myologic understanding of anatomy helped her excel in sports.
meanings.sent5: The myologic details of muscle function were crucial for his recovery after injury.
